body: Hmm I don't think that what we have now belongs in the interpreter. It emits instructions in the graph, and that's the job of the compiler. This function was supposed to be a simple way of applying a tiny hack to the IR loops to work with the code we have in the interpreter (and assert that we don't use the trip counter).
